Header: Anniversary Marked with Children in Apeksha Hospital
Content: Directorate of Information Technology (DIT) on account of its 9th anniversary, moving away from typical formalities, gave away gift parcels and books to the resident kids lying in the childrenâ€™s ward at Maharagama Apeksha Hospital on Friday (1). Members of the Directorate with the patronage extended by staff members spent the full day with those sick children and shared pleasantries with them amid Calypso music provided by the musicians of the 5 Sri Lanka Signal Corps. An entertainment programme on 24 March at Kukuleganga will culminate anniversary programmes.
